40 -class TabIndexer(object): 

41      """ 
42      Automatic tabindex filler to be used as `HTMLForm` post processor 
43   
44      :IVariables: 
45        `next_index` : ``callable`` 
46          Function to deliver the next index 
47      """ 
48      __implements__ = [_interfaces.PostProcInterface]

50 -    def __init__(self, start=1): 

51          """ 
52          Initialization 
53   
54          :Parameters: 
55            `start` : ``int`` 
56              Tabindex to start with 
57          """ 
58          self.next_index = _it.count(start).next 

59   

60 -    def __call__(self, method, node, kwargs): 

61          """ 
62          Add tabindex to form elements 
63   
64          Exceptions: ``<form>``, ``<option>``, ``<datalist>``, 
65          ``<input type="hidden">`` 
66   
67          :See: `PostProcInterface` 
68          """ 
69          if method not in ('form', 'option', 'hidden', 'datalist'): 
70              node['tabindex'] = self.next_index()
